description:
Students who recently graduated from Carnegie Mellon University’s School of Computer Science are making a handsome average salary of $89,800. New grads from the California Institute of Technology, known as Caltech, are earning an impressive $83,800 on average, while new School of Engineering alumni from Stanford are bringing home $74,500. These numbers come from a survey just released by NerdScholar, the higher education unit of NerdWallet, a five-year-old personal finance website based in San Francisco. NerdWallet offers price comparisons for everything from credit cards to airport parking.刚从卡内基梅隆大学计算机科学学院的毕业的学生工资优渥，平均89800美元。从加州理工学院毕业的学生，工资平均有83800美元，而斯坦福大学新工程学院的校友平均工资74500美元。这些数据来源NerdScholar，NerdWallet的高等教育单位最新发布的调查。NerdWalle是一家创立已有5年的私人金融网站，总部位于旧金山，提供各种价格比较，包括信用卡和机场停车费。

To put together the salary list, NerdScholar started with the top 100 national universities from US News & World Report’s list of top colleges plus the top 30 liberal arts schools from that list and cross-referenced those with data it culled from university career services that polled students about their salaries. It looked at starting salaries for the classes of 2011, 2012 and 2013 and averaged those numbers for each school. The list is far from comprehensive because many schools, like Harvard, Yale and Brown don’t release salary information. Those schools simply aren’t on the list. There are more than 4,500 degree-granting postsecondary institutions in the U.S. and NerdScholar only tracks a fraction of those. 为了建立工资表格，NerdScholar在美国新闻&世界报道大学排名中选取了前100名大学，加上列表上的30所文科学院。交叉引用了来自大学职业服务对学生薪水的调查。审视了2011,2012和2013级的起始工资和每个学院的平均工资。表格并不全面，因为很多学校，像哈佛大学、耶鲁大学、布朗大学没有公布工资信息。所以这些学校不在表上NerdScholar只追踪了在美国4500多所授予学位的高等教育机构种的一部分。

Here is a list of the top 10 schools:以下是前10名学校：

1. Carnegie Mellon University, School of Computer Science1. 卡耐基梅隆大学计算机科学学院

Average salary: $89,800平均工资：$89800

2. California Institute of Technology2. 加州理工学院

Average salary: $83,750平均工资：$83750

3. Stanford University, School of Engineering3. 斯坦福大学工程学院

Average salary: $74,500平均工资：$74,500

4. Harvey Mudd College4. 哈维姆德学院

Average salary: $72,500平均工资：$72,500

5. New York University, College of Nursing5. 纽约大学护理学院

Average salary: $79,200平均工资：$79,200

6. University of Pennsylvania, School of Engineering and Applied Science6. 宾夕法尼亚大学工程与应用科学学院

Average salary: $70,100平均工资：$70,100

7. Texas A&M University, Dwight Look College of Engineering7. 德克萨斯农工大学Dwight Look工程学院

Average salary: $69,100平均工资：$69,100

8. Massachusetts Institute of Technology8. 麻省理工学院

Average salary: $68,300平均工资：$68,300

9. Carnegie Mellon University, College of Engineering9. 卡耐基梅隆大学工程学院

Average salary: $68,300平均工资：$68,300

10. Georgia Institute of Technology, College of Computing10. 佐治亚理工学院计算机学院

Average salary: $67,700平均工资：$67,700

title: 大学工资排行：毕业后收入最高的美国高校Top10

description:
John Wesley Shipp's super-secret role on The Flash has finally been revealed!约翰卫斯里席柏在《闪电侠》中的神秘角色最终揭晓！

In a neat twist — since Shipp played The Flash in the 1990s TV series — the actor will play Barry Allen's (Grant Gustin) father, Henry Allen.席柏在90年代出演电视剧《闪电侠》，而此次他会出演Barry Allen的父亲，Henry Allen。

"Given his history with The Flash, Andrew [Kreisberg], Geoff [Johns] and I could only think of one person we wanted to play Barry's father and that was John Wesley Shipp," executive producer Greg Berlanti said in a statement. "He gives a fantastic and emotional performance in the pilot and we are looking forward to his presence in many more episodes. Also, personally, it was just wonderful to work with him again since my days at Dawson's Creek. He's a great actor and a great guy."“考虑到这个角色在《闪电侠》中的历史，Andrew （Kreisberg）, Geoff （Johns）和我只能想到约翰卫斯里席柏来出演Barry父亲这个角色。”该片的监制人Greg Berlanti在一份声明中提到。“他在飞行员的表演中表现得十分出色，富有情感，我们也期待他能参演更多剧集。同样，出于个人原因，在《恋爱时代》拍摄结束后能和他再次合作是一件非常美妙的事。他是个很好的演员，也是个很好的人。”

Shipp, who is also known for his role on Dawson's Creek as Dawson's dad, will recur on The Flash.席柏同样因出演《恋爱时代》中Dawson的父亲而为人所熟知，如今他在《闪电奇侠》中再度归来。

The freshman series will air Tuesdays at 8/7c this fall on The CW. Are you excited to see it? 《闪电侠》将会在秋季周二东部时间8点中部时间7点在CW电视网上映。你想看吗？
